Job Title: Trade Controls Specialist

Location: Andover, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Other, Project Management

Description:
SourceAbled is seeking candidates for a Direct Hire role as a Clinical Manufacturing Specialist with our client Pfizer, one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.
Seeking candidates in or near Andover, MA
This position is being offered as part of a disability/neurodiversity program which is designed to provide a more inclusive and supportive hiring process and work environment for job seekers with disabilities and neurodivergence, which includes, but is not limited to autism, ADD/ADHD, PTSD, OCD, Anxiety Disorder, Dyslexia, Bipolar, and Tourette's Syndrome
Role SummaryThe Trade Controls Specialist resides in the Global Trade Controls Center team and reports to the Director, Global Trade Controls. The Center team has global enterprise responsibility to develop controls and processes around Trade and oversee the technical implementation of trade controls in SAP GTS. The Trade Controls Specialist is responsible for developing and implementing policies and procedures to ensure compliance with trade laws globally and with Corporate Policy 206.
The Trade Controls Specialist will represent GTC on Cross Functional teams to insure that GTC requirements are incorporated into operational processes that impact trade. The Trade Control Specialist is responsible for monitoring and auditing the systemic processes in SAP GTS to ensure compliance with GTC requirements and to develop corrective action plans with the GTC Control Tower, plants, and markets to address compliance gaps. This also includes overseeing the continued deployment and business adoption of the Material Movers application in SAP GTS which is used to execute trade transactions outside of SAP.
The Trade Controls Specialist collaborates with the other Process and Compliance Center teams to implement GTC requirements, trade systems, policies and processes. The Trade Control Specialist will review and ensure integration of GTC processes with the Seagen business.
ROLE RESPONSIBILITIESDevelop policies, procedures and internal controls to insure compliance with trade laws and CP206Measure and monitor SAP GTS execution metrics and develop compliance improvement plans.Integrate GTC requirements into operational processes outside of GTC that impact tradeMeasure and monitor Material Movers execution metrics and drive deployment and business adoptionCollaborate with GTC Control Tower to implement GTC requirements, policies and processesIntegrate GTC processes into the Seagen business.Provide General Center Team Trade and Trade Compliance Support
QualificationsMust-Have•Bachelor’s degree with 3years of relevant experience ; OR Master’s degree with 1 year of relevant experience; OR Associate's degree with 6 years of relevant experience; OR 8 years of relevant experience with a high school diploma or equivalent experience in International Trade or Trade ComplianceProficiency in SAP and/or SAP GTS
Nice-to-HaveProficiency in MS Excel or Access
PHYSICAL/MENTAL REQUIREMENTSStrong attention to detail.Complex data analysis and reporting.

The annual base salary for this position ranges from $70,200.00 to $93,600.00. In addition, this position is eligible for participation in Pfizer’s Global Performance Plan with a bonus target of 10.0% of the base salary. We offer comprehensive and generous benefits and programs to help our colleagues lead healthy lives and to support each of life’s moments. Benefits offered include a 401(k) plan with Pfizer Matching Contributions and an additional Pfizer Retirement Savings Contribution, paid vacation, holiday and personal days, paid caregiver/parental and medical leave, and health benefits to include medical, prescription drug, dental and vision coverage. Learn more at Pfizer Candidate Site – U.S. Benefits | (uscandidates.mypfizerbenefits.com). Pfizer compensation structures and benefit packages are aligned based on the location of hire. The United States salary range provided applies to the Tampa, FL location only. The salary range provided does not apply to any other United States location or locations outside of the United States.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
